classes.name: masthead--no-shadow
classes.description: modifier class to remove the masthead box shadow on larger screens

classes.name: masthead__hide-nav-trigger
classes.description: hides nav trigger (hamburger or remove icon)

classes.name: masthead__branding--short
classes.description: modifier class used when application navigation is integrated into the masthead element

classes.name: masthead__branding--sidenav-collapsible
classes.description: modifier class used when application navigation is in collapsible mode.

classes.name: masthead__logo
classes.description: a class added to the logo

classes.name: masthead__logo--purple
classes.description: modifier class used when application theme is purple.

classes.name: masthead__divider
classes.description: a class added to the divider between logo and product label

classes.name: masthead__name
classes.description: a container for the application name

classes.name: masthead__content
classes.description: container for conditional content inside the masthead

classes.name: masthead__content--navigation
classes.description: modifier class used when navigation slot is integrated into the masthead element

classes.name: masthead__content--utilities
classes.description: modifier class used when utilities slot is integrated into the masthead element

classes.name: masthead--skinny
classes.description: modifier class for the smaller version of the masthead

classes.name: masthead__status-group
classes.description: class for masthead status bar item grouping

classes.name: masthead__status-item
classes.description: class for masthead status bar item
